name: The Time Traveler - A Minecraft Quest
name_original: The Time Traveler - A Minecraft Quest
description:
You wake up in a world you've never seen before. It does't look like Miami beach (the place you are from) at all. Explore the strange world with weird looking people...

W,A,S,D to walk

Spacebar to jump

Shift to run

Mouse to aim

Mouse button to fire
